name: fnf wednesdays infidelity test
description:
you need a scratch account to play https://scratch.mit.edu/ 

how to do (go to create, then go up to file, then click on "LOAD FROM YOUR COMPUTER", then select the file, then it will work) PS. if it asks you do you want to replace project with the file or whatever then click ok

or if your not wanting to download then here is the origin https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/628158969/

but if you dont want to have the THANK TO STEACKER or whatever then i would download the game
